Translations.Text: Ja deliver ona moj Lord's odkaz ja honestly radit ona
Je it i vela z zazrak ze odkaz pojdem ona tvoj Lord clovek ona warn ona? Recall lenze He robit ona inheritors ludia Noah multiplied tvoj zvazok! Zapamatat Si GOD's blessings ze ona succeed
They said ona pojdem robit us kult GOD alone zhyraly co our rodicia pouzivat kult? My challenge ona bring doom ona threaten us ona bol truthful
He said Ona incurred condemnation zloba tvoj Lord robi ona argue mna innovations ona fabricated -Ona tvoj rodicia -Kto never zmocnit GOD Therefore cakat ja cakat ona
My potom saved him those him by zlutovanie z us my annihilated those zamietnut our revelations refused bol believers

Do Thamoud my sent ich brat Saaleh. He said O moj ludia kult GOD ona nie have inak god Him. Proof je zadovazit for ona z tvoj Lord tu bol GOD's camel serve znamenie ona! Let ju jestn GOD's zem robi nie touch ju any harm lest ona incur painful retribution
